version.description: Version of the https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rpm-software-management/mock/main/mock/docs/buildroot-lock-schema.json schema the document conforms to. Semantic versioned. Mock that implements v2.Y.Z versions no longer reads v1.Y.Z.

buildroot.description: The object that describes the Mock buildroot

rpms.description: List of RPM packages installed in the buildroot

arch.description: Architecture for which the package was built, 'noarch' for arch agnostic packages

license.description: The distribution license(s) of the package

sigmd5.description: The SIGMD5 tag from the rpm header.

signature.description:
The signature used to sign the rpm (if any), last 8 characters from the "rpm  -q --qf '%{sigpgp:pgpsig}
'" output

url.description: Uniform Resource Locator that points to additional information on the packaged software

bootstrap.description: The object that describes the Mock bootstrap chroot.  Optional, only provided when bootstrap (image) is used.

image_digest.description: Digest got by the 'podman image inspect --format {{ .Digest }}' command, sha256 string

config.description: A set of important Mock configuration options used when the buildroot was generated (Mock's internal)
